summary: This module defines a comprehensive suite of unit tests that verify the correctness of delete operations across a complex Django data model. The tests cover signal handling, constraint deferral, parent‑child relationships, ordering, large and bulk deletions, many‑to‑many relationship cleanup, fast‑delete optimizations, and the various foreign‑key on_delete strategies (cascade, set null, protect, etc.).
business_intent: To ensure data integrity and expected behavior of delete actions within the application, preventing regressions and confirming that the ORM correctly propagates deletions according to model definitions and database constraints.
